remarks: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Restricted quantifier version with triple quantification.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
statement:
ralrimivvva.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B /\ z e. C ) ) -> ps ) $.
ralrimivvva $p |- ( ph -> A. x e. A A. y e. B A. z e. C ps ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d B z $.
$d ph x y z $.
